name: Send an email via Microsoft 365 Email from a new feature in ArcGIS Field Maps
description:
Every time a new feature is created in ArcGIS Field Maps, an email will be instantly sent via Microsoft 365 Email.

Note that the template works with a sample Debris map described in this [article.](https://www.esri.com/arcgis-blog/products/field-maps/field-mobility/automate-email-notifications-for-field-updates/)
